about_the_game:
create the life of your dreams, in this classic real time life simulation/rpg game.

will you become the success story to make your parents proud? or a hopeless loser? the choice is yours!

features
  • climb the corporate ladder in 8 different career tracks (including a criminal career track).
  • become an entrepreneur and start 1 of 3 different businesses.
  • earn 1 of 4 different degrees at the retro university college.
  • improve 6 different stats.
  • move out of your parents place and move up in the world.
  • pay rent and manage finances.
  • risk your life savings in the stock market, or at the casino. Or play it safe and earn interest in a savings account.
  • get married, and start a family. with 5 bachelorettes to woo. each with there own unique story.
  • befriend the 4 other bachelorettes male counterparts to progress a new unique story between them.
